about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am N C Mohan, a photographer based in India with a deep passion for capturing the world in its most honest and luminous moments.
My journeys have taken me across India's diverse terrains — from the mist-laden hills of Megamalai to the Himalayas.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
paragraphs: Every photograph begins with seeing — not just looking.
My instinct is to wait, watch, and respond
